description: Try our easy to follow Fruit & Nut Ice-Cream Pudding recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Fruit & Nut Ice-Cream Pudding Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.66 cup mixed dried fruit with glac√© cherries

recipeInstructions.text: Turn pudding onto a serving platter. Carefully remove plastic wrap. To serve, drizzle over chocolate topping, and decorate with toffee cherries and mint leaves.
